edits.corrected_text: I could never have been afraid of trusting you
edits.original_text: I could never have been afraid of trusting you

edits.corrected_text: raising her eyes frankly to his face
edits.original_text: raising her eyes frankly to his face

edits.corrected_text: I think I would have done so some time ago
edits.original_text: I think I would have done so some time ago

edits.corrected_text: if I had known how
edits.original_text: if I had known how

edits.corrected_text: But I scarcely know how, even now
edits.original_text: But I scarcely know how, even now

edits.corrected_text: has reason to be very happy
edits.original_text: has reason to be very happy

edits.corrected_text: God bless his wife and him
edits.original_text: God bless his wife and him

edits.corrected_text: She wept, as she tried to thank him
edits.original_text: She wept, as she tried to thank him

edits.corrected_text: He reassured her, took her hand as it lay with the trembling roses in it on his arm
edits.original_text: He reassured her, took her hand as it lay with the trembling roses in it on his arm

edits.corrected_text: took the remaining roses from it, and put it to his lips
edits.original_text: took the remaining roses from it, and put it to his lips

edits.corrected_text: At that time, it seemed to him, he first finally resigned the dying hope that had flickered in nobody's heart so much to its pain and trouble
edits.original_text: At that time, it seemed to him, he first finally resigned the dying hope that had flickered in nobody's heart so much to its pain and trouble

edits.corrected_text: and from that time he became in his own eyes, as to any similar hope or prospect, a very much older man who had done with that part of life
edits.original_text: and from that time he became in his own eyes, as to any similar hope or prospect, a very much older man who had done with that part of life

edits.corrected_text: He put the roses in his breast and they walked on for a little while, slowly and silently, under the umbrageous trees
edits.original_text: He put the roses in his breast and they walked on for a little while, slowly and silently, under the umbrageous trees

edits.corrected_text: Then he asked her, in a voice of cheerful kindness, was there anything else that she would say to him as her friend and her father's friend, many years older than herself
edits.original_text: Then he asked her, in a voice of cheerful kindness, was there anything else that she would say to him as her friend and her father's friend, many years older than herself

edits.corrected_text: was there any trust she would repose in him, any service she would ask of him, any little aid to her happiness that she could give him the lasting gratification of believing it was in his power to render
edits.original_text: was there any trust she would repose in him, any service she would ask of him, any little aid to her happiness that she could give him the lasting gratification of believing it was in his power to render

edits.corrected_text: She was going to answer, when she was so touched by some little hidden sorrow or sympathy
edits.original_text: She was going to answer, when she was so touched by some little hidden sorrow or sympathy

edits.corrected_text: what could it have been
edits.original_text: what could it have been

edits.corrected_text: that she said, bursting into tears again
edits.original_text: that she said, bursting into tears again

edits.corrected_text: O Mr. Clennam
edits.original_text: O Mr. Clennam

edits.corrected_text: Good, generous Mr. Clennam, pray tell me you do not blame me
edits.original_text: Good, generous Mr. Clennam, pray tell me you do not blame me

edits.corrected_text: I blame you
edits.original_text: I blame you

edits.corrected_text: said Clennam
edits.original_text: said Clennam

edits.corrected_text: My dearest girl
edits.original_text: My dearest girl

edits.corrected_text: I blame you
edits.original_text: I blame you

edits.corrected_text: No
edits.original_text: No

edits.corrected_text: After clasping both her hands upon his arm, and looking confidentially up into his face, with some hurried words to the effect that she thanked him from her heart
edits.original_text: After clasping both her hands upon his arm, and looking confidentially up into his face, with some hurried words to the effect that she thanked him from her heart

edits.corrected_text: as she did, if it be the source of earnestness
edits.original_text: as she did, if it be the source of earnestness

edits.corrected_text: she gradually composed herself, with now and then a word of encouragement from him, as they walked on slowly and almost silently under the darkening trees
edits.original_text: she gradually composed herself, with now and then a word of encouragement from him, as they walked on slowly and almost silently under the darkening trees

edits.corrected_text: And, now, Minnie Gowan
edits.original_text: And, now, Minnie Gowan

edits.corrected_text: at length said Clennam, smiling
edits.original_text: at length said Clennam, smiling

edits.corrected_text: will you ask me nothing
edits.original_text: will you ask me nothing

edits.corrected_text: Oh
edits.original_text: Oh

edits.corrected_text: I have very much to ask of you
edits.original_text: I have very much to ask of you

edits.corrected_text: That's well
edits.original_text: That's well

edits.corrected_text: I hope so
edits.original_text: I hope so

edits.corrected_text: I am not disappointed
edits.original_text: I am not disappointed

edits.corrected_text: You know how I am loved at home, and how I love home
edits.original_text: You know how I am loved at home, and how I love home

edits.corrected_text: You can hardly think it perhaps, dear Mr. Clennam
edits.original_text: You can hardly think it perhaps, dear Mr. Clennam

edits.corrected_text: she spoke with great agitation
edits.original_text: she spoke with great agitation

edits.corrected_text: seeing me going from it of my own free will and choice, but I do so dearly love it
edits.original_text: seeing me going from it of my own free will and choice, but I do so dearly love it

edits.corrected_text: I am sure of that
edits.original_text: I am sure of that

edits.corrected_text: said Clennam
edits.original_text: said Clennam

edits.corrected_text: Can you suppose I doubt it
edits.original_text: Can you suppose I doubt it
